dashboard.title: Project Overview
dashboard.configureInputs: Please configure your inputs to see results
dashboard.demandCapacitySummary: Analysis of customer demand against product capacity

inputs.title: Input Parameters
inputs.productAddedDesc: A new product has been added to your project.
inputs.maxProductsReached: You cannot add more than 10 products.
inputs.prescriberAddedDesc: A new prescriber has been added to your project.
inputs.maxPrescribersReached: You cannot add more than 10 prescribers.
inputs.shareExceedsWarning: Warning: Total prescriber revenue share exceeds 100%. This will result in higher commission costs than expected.

metrics.irrDesc: Compare with WACC to determine if the project creates value.
metrics.npvDesc: Net present value of future cash flows at discount rate.
metrics.cacDesc: Average cost to acquire a new customer.
metrics.ltvDesc: Total economic value a customer brings during their lifecycle.
metrics.paybackDesc: Time needed to recover customer acquisition cost.
metrics.ltvCacDesc: Ratio > 3 indicates a good business model.
metrics.ebitdaDesc: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization.
metrics.ebitdaMarginDesc: Operating profitability as a percentage of revenue.

tooltips.product-units: Number of physical units available for rental
tooltips.product-pricing-mode: Choose between daily or monthly pricing
tooltips.product-min-days: Minimum number of days for rental (for daily pricing)
tooltips.prescriber-share: Proportion of revenue attributed to this prescriber (0-100%)
tooltips.prescriber-commission: Commission rate on their portion of revenue (0-100%)
tooltips.new-customers: Number of new customers in first year
tooltips.rentals-per-customer: Average number of rentals per customer per year
tooltips.growth: Annual growth rate for new customers (0-100%)
tooltips.irr: Internal Rate of Return - the discount rate that makes NPV=0
tooltips.npv: Net Present Value - sum of discounted future cash flows
tooltips.cac: Customer Acquisition Cost - cost to acquire one new customer
tooltips.ltv: Customer Lifetime Value - total profit from a customer over time
tooltips.payback: Time required to recover customer acquisition cost
tooltips.ltvCac: Ratio of LTV to CAC - higher is better, >3 is good
tooltips.ebitda: Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation and Amortization
tooltips.ebitda-margin: EBITDA as a percentage of revenue
tooltips.churn: Annual percentage of customers who stop using your service
tooltips.max-rentals-per-unit: Maximum theoretical rentals per unit per year
tooltips.potential-capacity: Maximum theoretical rental capacity based on units
tooltips.demand-rentals: Total rental demand from all customers
tooltips.occupancy-real: Real occupancy based on demand vs. capacity
tooltips.actual-rentals: Actual rentals based on real occupancy

sensitivity.title: Sensitivity Analysis
sensitivity.tornadoDesc: Impact of ±10% variation in key parameters on final year EBITDA
sensitivity.monteCarloDesc: Distribution of possible outcomes after 1,000 random variations

scenarios.title: Scenario Lab
scenarios.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scenario?
scenarios.maxCompare: You can compare up to 3 scenarios

investorPacket.title: Investor Packet
investorPacket.demandVsCapacityDesc: Analysis of customer demand against product capacity
investorPacket.customerRetentionDesc: How customer base evolves over time with new acquisitions and churn
investorPacket.revenueFormula: How revenue is calculated across products and pricing modes
investorPacket.rentalsPerYearDaily: Daily pricing: Maximum Rentals/Year = 365 days / Min Days
investorPacket.revenueDailyFormula: Daily pricing: Revenue = Actual Rentals × Price per Day × Min Days × Growth Factor
investorPacket.revenueMonthlyFormula: Monthly pricing: Revenue = Actual Rentals × Price per Month × Growth Factor
investorPacket.productCostsFormula: Product Costs = Actual Rentals × Variable Cost × Inflation Factor × Growth Factor
investorPacket.prescriberCostsFormula: Prescriber Costs = Sum(Revenue × Prescriber Share × Commission Rate)
investorPacket.directorCostsFormula: Director Commission = Total Revenue × Director Commission Rate
investorPacket.structuralCostsFormula: Structural Costs = (Salaries + Infrastructure + Web Maintenance + Marketing) × Inflation Factor
investorPacket.ebitdaFormula: EBITDA = Revenue - Variable Costs - Structural Costs
investorPacket.cashFlowFormula: Cash Flow = EBITDA (simplified, ignoring taxes, CAPEX, etc.)
investorPacket.cacFormula: CAC = (Marketing Spend + Prescriber Commissions for New Customers) / New Customers
investorPacket.ltvFormula: LTV = Sum(Revenue_n × Gross Margin % × Survival Rate_n / (1 + Discount Rate)^n)
investorPacket.paybackFormula: Payback Period = CAC / Monthly Gross Profit per Customer
investorPacket.churnImpact: Higher churn reduces customer base and LTV
investorPacket.rentalsImpact: More rentals per customer increase demand and revenue
investorPacket.exampleDailyFormula: Daily: With {{units}} units, {{actualRentals}} actual rentals, {{daysMin}} min days, {{price}}€/day → Revenue = {{revenue}}€
investorPacket.exampleMonthlyFormula: Monthly: With {{units}} units, {{actualRentals}} actual rentals, {{price}}€/month → Revenue = {{revenue}}€
